entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expose IBuiltInAnalyzer.GetAnalyzerCategory in some fashion. #77399
  • Remove unnecessary lambda expression (IDE0200) when lambda is necessary #77395
    Backlog
  • The commands "Next Method" and "Previous Method" don't clear selection and move caret if a selection is active #77393
  • Incorrect CS8911 for 'global using unsafe' with pointer type #77389

Closed

  • Exception trying to get the extent of a (malformed) string literal #77198
  • C# editor pressing CTRL+BACKSPACE to erase a word causes an error dialog to appear when the word is an unclosed " #77401
  • MemberNotNullWhen does not work with inheritance #77313
  • DoesNotReturnAttribute is not considered in catch block #77398
  • IDE0059 erroneously raised for write into span #77390

PullRequests

Created

  • Add LSP handler for custom requests #77400
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Fix out of bounds in text extent computation #77402
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove async/await #77397
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Simplify keyword recommenders. #77396
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Extensions: Resolve classic and new extension methods together #77343
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77374
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix unexpected exceptions #77385
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix formatting in tests #77394
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • WIP: First attempt at cleaning up package load to do less thread switching during InitializeAsync #77368
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement field null resilience analysis #77127
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't report NFW for expected exceptions on shutdown. #77370
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Bump BCL references to 9.0 #76890
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Extensions: rewrite delegate and function pointer creations #77378
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Collection expression arguments: ref safety tests #77381
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Adds :bulb: `Implement Using Copilot` for `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • WIP: Initial work to support bulk renaming of files to match types contained within. #77239
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove the ProjectDiagnosticAnalyzer type #74353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch to using field+auto-prop #76906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Seeing what tests cover the concept of other-diagnostics #77063
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Improve performance of SyntaxReplacer.ReplaceNode #77314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Remove source generator diagnostic reporting from Workspace #76863
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Partial events and constructors: IDE #77337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Feature - Partial Events and Constructors
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete `Dictionary<TKey, TValue>` target type #76502
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
